data.expected_result: Mention is used in next opened Text channel / No Mention button
data.short_description: In a voice channel with screen share/video in the full screen you can click "Mention" on a user but will do nothing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a Voice channel with Screen share - Open up the "full view" (not full screen) view - Right click on a user / anywhere - Click Mention button
